questions.text: What does SEO stand for in digital marketing?
questions.explanation: SEO stands for Search Engine Optimization - the practice of improving your website to increase its visibility when people search for products or services related to your business in search engines like Google.

questions.text: What is the marketing funnel's typical order of stages?
questions.explanation: The classic marketing funnel follows AIDA: Awareness (people learn about you), Interest (they want to know more), Desire (they want your product), and Action (they make a purchase). This model helps you understand the customer journey.

questions.text: What is a key benefit of content marketing?
options: It builds trust and authority over time
It replaces all other marketing methods
It requires no planning or strategy
questions.explanation: Content marketing builds trust and establishes your authority in your industry by providing valuable information to your audience. While it doesn't guarantee instant results, it creates long-term relationships and positions you as an expert.
